name: Mahila Samman Savings Certificate
description: A savings scheme offering a fixed return of 7.5% per annum to women for a two-year tenure.
eligibility: Open to all women; minimum deposit of ₹1,000 and maximum of ₹2 lakh.

name: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao (BBBP)
description: Promotes survival, protection, and education of the girl child.
eligibility: Open to families with girl children.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
description: Provides cash incentives for pregnant women and lactating mothers.

name: One Stop Centre Scheme
description: Provides support to women affected by violence, offering legal, medical, and psychological aid.
eligibility: Women facing violence in any form.

name: Mahila E-Haat
description: Online platform supporting women entrepreneurs, SHGs, and NGOs in showcasing their products.

name: Working Women Hostel
description: Ensures safe and affordable accommodation for working women.
eligibility: Working women, women undergoing training, and economically weaker sections.

name: Ujjawala Scheme
description: Focuses on prevention, rescue, rehabilitation, and reintegration of trafficking victims.
eligibility: Victims of trafficking for sexual exploitation.

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY)
description: Savings scheme for the education and marriage expenses of a girl child.
eligibility: Parents or guardians of a girl child below 10 years.

name: National Creche Scheme
description: Provides daycare facilities to working mothers for children under six years of age.

name: STEP Scheme
description: Skill development program to enhance employability of women.
eligibility: Unemployed women aged 16 years and above.

name: Nirbhaya Fund
description: Dedicated to enhancing the safety and security of women in India.
eligibility: Projects aimed at improving women's safety.

name: Swadhar Greh Scheme
description: Provides shelter, food, clothing, and care to women in distress.

name: Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY)
description: Encourages institutional deliveries by providing cash incentives to pregnant women.
eligibility: Pregnant women in rural and urban areas below the poverty line.

name: National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM)
description: Promotes self-employment and entrepreneurship among women in rural areas.

name: Rajiv Gandhi Scheme for Empowerment of Adolescent Girls (SABLA)
description: Improves the nutritional and health status of adolescent girls.

name: Dhanalakshmi Scheme
description: Provides financial incentives to families for the education of girl children.
eligibility: Families below the poverty line with girl children.

name: Kasturba Gandhi Balika Vidyalaya (KGBV)
description: Promotes education among girls belonging to disadvantaged groups.
eligibility: Girls from SC/ST, OBC, and minority communities.

name: Indira Gandhi National Old Age Pension Scheme
description: Provides pensions to elderly women in poverty.
eligibility: Women aged 60 years and above, living below the poverty line.

name: Priyadarshini Scheme
description: Empowers rural women by creating sustainable livelihood opportunities.
